meanings.definition: A Mexican plant of the morning glory family, with tuberous roots that are dried and used medicinally as a purgative.
meanings.sent1: The jalap plant grows in Mexico and has roots that help with digestion.
meanings.sent2: I bought some jalap roots from the store for their medicinal properties.
meanings.sent3: When the jalap plant heard it was a purgative, it blushed bright red!
meanings.sent4: Herbal remedies are like jalap roots, cleansing the body of impurities.
meanings.sent5: The tuberous roots of the jalap plant work like a natural detox for the body.

meanings.definition: The dried tuberous roots of the jalap plant, used as a purgative.
meanings.sent1: She took a spoonful of powdered jalap to help with her digestion.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist recommended jalap as a natural remedy for constipation.
meanings.sent3: The jalap roots in the medicine cabinet seemed to be whispering to each other.
meanings.sent4: After taking the jalap, she felt as light as a feather, as if all impurities were gone.
meanings.sent5: The effects of the jalap roots were like a gentle cleanse for her system.
